message.content:
cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.PL

Reasoning: 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing): The paper discusses a distributed microservices architecture for a smart building platform, which falls under the scope of distributed computing. 
- cs.SE (Software Engineering): The paper discusses the software architecture and design of the smart building platform, which falls under the scope of software engineering. 
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture): The paper discusses the use of an advanced sensor network for the smart building platform, which falls under the scope of networking and internet architecture. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper discusses the benefits of the smart building platform in terms of energy saving, safety, and comfort, which falls under the scope of systems and control. 
- cs.PL (Programming Languages): The paper discusses the use of the Jolie language as a central feature of the smart building platform, which falls under the scope of programming languages.
